prefix.title: IconPrefix
prefix.description: A Font Awesome shortPrefixId, such as fas, far, or fab.

oneOf.description: A name alias, normally this is the old name when an icon has been renamed.
A composite unicode alias, represented as a base 10 integer.

items.description: Ligatures. This is deprecated and will normally be empty.
The main or canonical unicode for the icon.

oneOf.description: The single SVG path data as a string, for a monotone icon. Used in a d attribute of an SVG path element.

Array of SVG path data string, for a duotone icon. A duotone icon always has two paths, even if one is an empty string. Each is used in the d attribute of an SVG path element. Secondary path is listed first, primary is listed second.

items.description: SVG path data. A monotone icon always has a single path as a string. A duotone icon always has two paths as an array of strings.
